game.description: Quest to retrieve a mystical artifact for the village elder's wisdom.
game.objective: Successfully recover the artifact from the lost temple
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a magical staff granting extra magical powers

tasks.description: Explore the entrance to the temple, guarded by ancient statues
tasks.objective: Disarm traps and decipher the hieroglyphics to find the entrance

tasks.description: Climb the sacred pyramid within the temple's chambers
tasks.objective: Overcome puzzles and face the guardian beast

tasks.description: Unseal the artifact chamber and claim victory
tasks.location: Heart of the temple, hidden room
tasks.objective: Defeat the final challenge and secure the mystical artifact

game.title: The Quest for the Lost Temple's Ancient Treasure
